name: AI Mahjong 2000
overview: Ai Mahjong 2000 is a mahjong game that features 3 different kind of board background colours and different opponent difficulty levels. Manufacturer's description: 1. Interfere with any algorithm. It transcends the unnatural strength which depended only on the computational power such as simple memory power, probability calculation, fluctuation value calculation which conventional Mahjong software makes. Developed a new algorithm corresponding to ambiguity such as opponent feeling, flow of tiles. 2. Points of Duty · You can finely set various rules and roles such as flow definition, role definition, Wallejn from horse. You can enjoy from the highest ranking rule to your regular setting. Features: - First person perspective. - 2D graphics - Cartoon graphics - Mahjong theme.
